title: What can I do if my ringtone automatically restores to the default one after I change it?
answer:
l   If the ringtone you set is not a native one, check whether you have deleted the ringtone file. If so, download the file and set the ringtone again.

l   If the ringtone file you set is saved in the microSD card, the ringtone will restore to the default one when you connect your phone to a computer in USB storage mode. Disconnect your phone from the computer or move the ringtone file to your phone storage.

l   If the ringtone file you set is saved in a microSD card, check whether you have uninstalled the microSD card. If so, install the microSD card and set the ringtone again.

l   If the problem persists, back up important data and restore your phone to its factory settings, and set your ringtone again.
